mapper.select: SELECT PRCS_NO, PRCS_DIV, PRCS_CD, PRCS_NM, PRCS_CTNT FROM PRCS WHERE PRCS_DIV=#{prcsDiv}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRCS(PRCS_NO, PRCS_DIV, PRCS_CD, PRCS_NM, PRCS_CTNT) VALUES (PRCS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{prcsDiv}, #{prcsCd}, #{prcsNm}, #{prcsCtnt})
mapper.select: SELECT #{PRCS_FG} || PRCS_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS PRCS_CD FROM DUAL
SELECT B.BOM_CD, O.ORDER_NO, O.PAPRD_DT, O.PRDT_NM, O.ORDER_CNT, O.PLAN_CD, O.EDCTS_CD FROM ORDER_SHEET O INNER JOIN BOM B ON O.EDCTS_CD = B.EDCTS_CD WHERE O.PLAN_CD = 'N' ORDER BY O.PAPRD_DT
SELECT ORDER_NO, VEND_NM, PRDT_NM, ORDER_CNT FROM ORDER_SHEET O WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
SELECT 'IC' || INDICA_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS INDICA_CD FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDICA (INDICA_CD, INDICA_DT) VALUES ('IC' || INDICA_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_SHEET SET PLAN_CD = #{planCd} WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NO, O.PRDT_NM, B.BOM_CD FROM ORDER_SHEET O INNER JOIN BOM B ON O.EDCTS_CD = B.EDCTS_CD WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

SELECT R.RSC_CD, R.RSC_NM, RS.AVAL_STC, SUM(RB.OUST_CNT) AS OUST_CNT FROM ORDER_SHEET O INNER JOIN BOM B ON O.EDCTS_CD = B.EDCTS_CD INNER JOIN RS_BOM RB ON B.BOM_CD = RB.BOM_CD INNER JOIN RSC R ON R.RSC_CD = RB.RSC_CD INNER JOIN RSC_STC RS ON R.RSC_CD = RS.RSC_CD WHERE B.BOM_CD = #{bomCd} GROUP BY R.RSC_CD, R.RSC_NM, RS.AVAL_STC
SELECT vp.eq_sq, vp.prcs_cd, p.prcs_nm FROM V_PRODBOM vp JOIN BOM b ON vp.bom_cd = b.bom_cd JOIN prcs p ON vp.prcs_cd = p.prcs_cd WHERE prdt_nm = #{prdtNm}
